data.title: Alba Iulia hosts SIMPLA’s 5th Project Meeting
data.meta_description:
Between the 19th and 20th of June, SIMPLA consortium gathers in Alba Iulia (Romania) to attend the 5th meeting since the beginning of the project. The event brings together partner and stakeholders from around Europe, namely: ALEA, ALBA, AREA, CIRCE, DIP. Huelva, DIP. Zaragoza, DLAEM, Karnten, REAK, Promoscience, Regione FVG, Regione Toscana, STENUM, and UBBSLA.

On the 19th during the first part of the day, project updates and advancements will be discussed. After a welcome speech from Alba Local Energy Agency (ALEA) and AREA, presentations will be made on the latest version of SIMPLA guidelines and on the outcomes of SIMPLA webinars, amongst others. A review of the progress of coaching actions and a case study on Austria will open the afternoon session of the meeting. Lastly, a recapitulation of what is next in the SIMPLA agenda and of the due deliverables will be made. A guided tour of Alba Iulia’s fortress will conclude the first day of the meeting.

On the 20th of June, a “round table” on project indicators, estimation and methodology will officially close the meeting.
